page.name: ace/impl-doc/configuration
page.summary: Most of the XAF configuration variables, servlet context variables, classpaths, and other options may be viewed within ACE.

tr.td: All of the Configuration variables are displayed in a single page. This includes the variable name, the pre-evaluation variable value (the original expression), and the post-evaluation variable value (the final run-time value). In addition to serving as the configuration documentation, the page serves as a unit test environment to ensure that the variables are properly being initialized.
Many servlet-context variables are also visible within ACE, including the current execution mode (Production, Testing, or Development) and the active classloader and classpath.
